testcase.name: When the @Digits and @DecimalMin and @DecimalMax applied to the same field, Podam should use minimum requirements
Podam should allow validation annotations customization
When the @Size annotation doesn't have a max length specified, Podam should assign a sensible value
Podam should be able to fulfill most of the javax Validation framework
When the AnnotationStrategy and the TypeManufacturer are specified, the former has precedence
Podam should be able to fulfill most of the javax Validation 2.0 framework
